RequestCredentials.summary: The credentials read-only property of the interface reflects the value given to the constructor in the credentials option. It determines whether or not the browser sends credentials with the request, as well as whether any Set-Cookie response headers are respected.

remarks.para: Credentials are cookies, TLS client certificates, or authentication headers containing a username and password.
See Including credentials for more details.

RequestCredentials.value: A string with one of the following values:
